tests.name: "asking a question"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh 'Does this cryogenic chamber make me look fat?'

tests.name: "talking forcefully"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh "Let's go make out behind the gym!"

tests.name: "using acronyms in regular speech"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh "It's OK if you don't want to go to the DMV."

tests.name: "forceful question"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh 'WHAT THE HELL WERE YOU THINKING?'

tests.name: "shouting with special characters"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh 'ZOMG THE %^*@#$(*^ ZOMBIES ARE COMING!!11!!1!'

tests.name: "statement containing question mark"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh 'Ending with ? means a question.'

tests.name: "prattling on"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh 'Wait! Hang on. Are you going to be OK?'

tests.name: "multiple line question"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh $'\nDoes this cryogenic chamber make me look fat?\nNo'

tests.name: "ending with whitespace"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh 'Okay if like my spacebar quite a bit? '

tests.name: "non-question ending with whitespace"
tests.cmd: bash bob.sh 'This is a statement ending with whitespace '
